title: Cloud-Backed Mixed Reality
body: In a modern world of cloud computing and virtual reality experiences, see how Mixed Reality from Microsoft intersects with the real world while connected to various cloud services in Azure. Learn you can get started with HoloLens and the all-new Windows Mixed Reality immersive headsets, while leveraging your reusable skills in C#, Visual Studio, Azure and Cognitive Services.
speaker: Shahed Chowdhuri
